ui.practicalpets.chat.level_up: LEVEL UP! %s has advanced to level %s!
ui.practicalpets.chat.got_founders_hat: The first 5 pets you tame will be equipped with a limited-time %s! When/if the mod gets popular, the founder's hat will become unobtainable in survival. This is pet #%s out of 5.
ui.practicalpets.info.item.anniversary_p: The %s makes a pet level up twice as fast.
tooltip.practicalpets.pet_end_rod_launch: Right-click with end rods to fill
ui.practicalpets.pigeon_send.title: Send pigeon to player
ui.practicalpets.pigeon_send.need_backpa: Equip the pigeon with a pet backpack to send items to players.
The backpack must have at least one item for the pigeon to be sent.
ui.practicalpets.pigeon_send.need_levels: You must have at least 1 level to send the pigeon.
ui.practicalpets.pigeon_send.no_targets: There are no players to send the pigeon to. Players must be in the same dimension and more than 32 blocks away.
ui.practicalpets.pigeon_send.target_succ: You have received some items from %s's %s!
advancement.practicalpets.root.title: Practical Pets
advancement.practicalpets.root.desc: Enter a world full of unique useful pets
advancement.practicalpets.giraffe_cat_ta: Tame a giraffe cat that spawns in savannas with fish or leaves
advancement.practicalpets.giraffe_cat0.d: Make a giraffe cat go into ladder mode by using a ladder on it or opening its menu
advancement.practicalpets.giraffe_cat1.d: Use a giraffe cat to throw pets at your enemies
advancement.practicalpets.banana_duck_ta: Tame a banana duck that spawns in jungles with bread
advancement.practicalpets.banana_duck0.t: Is it a fruit or actually meat?
advancement.practicalpets.banana_duck0.d: Make a banana duck make a banana that gives you effects by feeding it an apple
advancement.practicalpets.banana_duck1.d: Use a banana peel to make your enemies slip to their death
advancement.practicalpets.stick_bug_tame: Tame a stick bug that spawns in forests with seeds, fruit or leaves
advancement.practicalpets.stick_bug0.des: Kill a mob using a stick bug without the mob realizing a thing
advancement.practicalpets.stick_bug1.des: Make a stick bug turn potato crops to sticks by letting it randomly dance on them
advancement.practicalpets.rat_tame.title: Helpful Squeaker
advancement.practicalpets.rat_tame.desc: Tame a rat that spawns in forests with seeds, fruit or crops
advancement.practicalpets.rat0.title: Little Thief
advancement.practicalpets.rat0.desc: Make a rat steal a mob's weapon by attacking it
advancement.practicalpets.rat1.title: Rat-atouille
advancement.practicalpets.rat1.desc: Make a rat cook ratatouille by giving it a chef hat, a bowl and a few crops
advancement.practicalpets.pigeon_tame.de: Tame a pigeon that spawns in most biomes with seeds, bread or crops
advancement.practicalpets.pigeon0.title: Air Mail
advancement.practicalpets.pigeon0.desc: Use a pigeon to send items to a player by opening up its menu
advancement.practicalpets.pigeon1.title: Pickup Artist
advancement.practicalpets.pigeon1.desc: Use a pigeon to bring you an item you can't reach by punching the air while looking at the item
advancement.practicalpets.duck_tame.desc: Tame a duck that spawns in rivers with seeds, bread or crops
advancement.practicalpets.duck0.title: Not a Diamond Nugget
advancement.practicalpets.duck0.desc: Get your duck to find a chicken nugget in grass or water. Better luck next time!
advancement.practicalpets.duck1.title: Bath Time
advancement.practicalpets.duck1.desc: Get your duck to find a rubber ducky pet hat. It can be put on pets to help them in battle
advancement.practicalpets.kiwi_tame.desc: Tame a kiwi that spawns in forests with spider eyes
advancement.practicalpets.kiwi0.title: Fresh Look
advancement.practicalpets.kiwi0.desc: Shear a kiwi to get kiwi feathers than can craft pet equipment
advancement.practicalpets.kiwi1.title: A Practical Accessory
advancement.practicalpets.kiwi1.desc: Craft a pet hat that can once absorb deadly damage using kiwi feathers
ui.practicalpets.info_book.welcome: Thanks for installing the §lPractical Pets§r mod! Select a pet in the contents below to learn about it
ui.practicalpets.info_book.general.title: General
ui.practicalpets.info_book.banana_duck.g: Banana ducks spawn in §ljungles§r and are tamed with §lbread§r.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.banana_duck.b: If you feed a tamed banana duck an §lapple§r, it'll spit out a §lpoultry banana§r which gives a random §lbeneficial effect§r of amplifier II when eaten. Every §l10§r §lbananas§r you make, §lyou§r lose §l1§r level. Banana ducks unlock more items they can turn into bananas as they level up. In level 5 they unlock sweet berries, and in level 10 they unlock melon.

Eating a poultry banana also gives you a §lbanana§r §lpeel§r which can be placed down as a §ldeadly§r §ltrap§r. Two banana peels are enough to kill most monsters, mobs immune to fall damage don't get hurt by banana peels however.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.banana_duck.l:
Banana ducks can be §lleveled§l §rup§r by making them kill mobs. However since they're very weak they don't defend you unless they're equipped with something that makes them stronger, such as §lduck§r §larmor§r and the rubber ducky pet hat.
Leveled up banana ducks are §lstronger§r and can turn more kinds of items into poultry bananas.
Ducks spawn near §llakes§r and §lrivers§r and are tamed with §lbread§r, §lseeds§r, §lcarrots§r or §lmelon§r.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.duck.finding_: If a tamed duck isn't sitting, it'll find random §litems§r §lin§r §lgrass§l §land§r §lwater§r, mostly seeds and junk fishing loot but rarely it'll find ore nuggets(including §ldiamond§r §lnuggets§r). Leveled up ducks find better items and more often.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.duck.rubbery_: The rubber ducky pet hat is an item rarely found by ducks in water. It can be equipped on §lany§r §lpet§r from this mod to make it more likely to "§lcombo§r" (hit its target without getting hurt back) its target. It also enables pets that don't usually fight for you, to §lfight§r §lfor§r §lyou§r §lanyway§r, just like any piece of pet equipment that makes the pet stronger does
ui.practicalpets.info_book.duck.leveling:
Ducks can be §lleveled§r §lup§r by making them kill mobs. However since they're very weak they don't defend you unless they're equipped with something that makes them stronger, such as §lduck§r §larmor§r and the rubber ducky pet hat.
Leveled up ducks are §lstronger§r and find better items and more often.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.rat.general.b: Rats spawn in §lforests§r and §lcaves§r and are tamed with §lcrops§r, §lseeds§r, or §lfruit§r.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.rat.robbing.b:
If you attack or get attacked by a mob holding a weapon, tamed rats will §lsteal§r §lits§r §lweapon§r and bring it to you.
The stolen item will get a random amount of §ldurability§r §ldamage§r, which becomes less as the rat levels up until level 10 where no damage is added.
Rats also can't steal from §lbosses§r and can't steal items with a §lrarity§r other than common. They can steal enchanted items however.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.rat.cooking.b:
Rats §lcan§r §lcook§r §lratatouille§r if you equip them with a §lpet§r §lchef§r §lhat§r and give them a §lbowl§r and §l3§r §lcrops§r other than wheat.
When eaten, ratatouille gives you §lnight vision§r, §lresistance§r and §lregeneration§r for a few seconds. Higher level rats make better ratatouille.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.rat.crossbree: You can get a rat with a §lpattern§r by breeding 2 rats of a §ldifferent§r §lcolor§r.
Rats can be §lleveled§r §lup§r by making them kill mobs. However since they're very weak they only defend you from mobs they can rob.
You can make them defend you from everything by equipping them with something that makes them stronger, such as the §lrubber§r §lducky§r §lpet§r §lhat§r.
Leveled up rats are §lstronger§r, make §lbetter§r §lratatouille§r and damage the items they steal less.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.pigeon.genera: Pigeons spawn in §lmost§r §lbiomes§r and are tamed with §lbread§r, §lseeds§r, or §lcarrots§r.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.pigeon.reachi: §lPunch§r §lair§r or a block while looking at a §ldropped§r §litem§r, and the pigeon will §lbring§r §lit§r to you
ui.practicalpets.info_book.pigeon.sendin:
If you equip a pigeon with a §lpet§r §lbackpack§r and put items in it and then it'll be able to §lsend§r §lthe§r §lbackpack's§r §lcontent§r to other players.
The target player must be in the same dimension as you, and more than 32 blocks away.
To send a pigeon to a player open §lthe§r §lscreen§r §lwhere§r §lyou§r §lput§r §lequipment§r §lon/off§r by shift-right clicking the pigeon, and then press the mail button.
Sending a pigeon consumes §l1§r §llevel§r from you. If you don't have a level, you can't send a pigeon.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.pigeon.leveli: Pigeons can be leveled up by equipping them with a rubber ducky hat and making them kill mobs. Higher level pigeons are just stronger.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.stick_bug.gen: Stick bugs spawn in §lmost§r §lbiomes§r and are tamed with §lleaves§r, §lseeds§r, or §lfruit§r. When tamed, they always defend their owner.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.stick_bug.inv:
When a stick bug has to §lattack§r something it'll become §linvisible§r and then it'll attack §lwithout§r §lmost§r §lmobs§r §lfighting§r §lback§r against it.
Note however that stick bugs are still §lnot immune to§r projectiles, fire, explosions, mob effects and mobs that attack everything, such as wardens and zoglins.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.stick_bug.dan: Stick bugs dance to §ljukeboxes§r and also §ldance§r §lrandomly§r. If a stick bug randomly dances on full grown §lpotatoes§r, it'll turn them into §lpotato§r §lsticks§r, which can be §leaten§r §lvery§r §lfast§r.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.stick_bug.lev: Stick bugs can be §lleveled§r §lup§r by making them kill mobs. Higher level stick bugs are §lstronger§r and dance randomly more, turning potatoes into §lpotato§r §lsticks§r §lmore§r §loften§r.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.giraffe_cat.g: Giraffe cats spawn in §lsavannas§r and are tamed with §lleaves§r or §lraw§l §rfish§r. When tamed, they always defend their owner.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.giraffe_cat.l:
Press the §lladder§r §lbutton§r §lin§r §lyour§r §lgiraffe§r §lcat's§r §lmenu§r to make it §lextend§r §lits§r §lneck§r and be §lclimbable§r §llike§r §la§r §lladder§r.
You can alternatively toggle the ladder mode by using a ladder on the giraffe cat. The ladder won't be consumed.
When it's in ladder mode, §lright click§r it to §lextend§r §lits§r §lneck§r, §lshift§r §lright§r §lclick§r it to §lshrink§r §lit§r. If its neck is shrunk to under 2 blocks, it'll exit ladder mode. If it's hurt, including by you, while in ladder mode, it will take no damage and exit ladder mode.
It also §lteleports§r §lto §lyou§r §lafter§r §lyou§r §lclimb§r it.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.giraffe_cat.y:
If a tamed giraffe cat is angry at something, it'll §lpick§r §lup§r non-sitting §lpets§r of the same owner §land§r §lthrow§r §lthem§r §lat§r §lits§r §ltarget§r. It can pick up any pet, whether from this mod, other mods or vanilla.
If the thrown pet hits the target, the giraffe cat's and thrown pet's attack damage and effects are both applied to it.
If the thrown pet hits the target, or misses it but can pathfind to it, §lthe§r §lthrown§r §lpet§r §lwill§r §lbecome§r §langry§r §lat§r §lthe§r §ltarget§r, even if it usually wouldn't defend its owner
ui.practicalpets.info_book.giraffe_cat.c: if you breed a giraffe cat with a cat, the baby will be a §lgiraffe§r §lcat§r §lwith§r §lthe§r §lcat's§r §lvariant§r. This won't work properly if you have the More Mob Variants mod installed and you'll instead get a giraffe cat with a random cat variant instead.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.giraffe_cat.l: Giraffe cats can §llevel§r §lup§r by attacking/killing mobs, whether directly or by throwing pets. Higher level giraffe cats just have more health and more attack damage..
Kiwis spawn in §lforests§r §lat§r §lnight§r and are tamed with §lspider§r §leyes§r.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.kiwi.shearing: Kiwis can be §lsheared§r for their feathers, which can be used to §lcraft§r most of the §lpet§r §lequipment§r. Higher level kiwis regrow their feathers faster. You can also use §lbone§r §lmeal§r on them to make their feathers regrow faster.
ui.practicalpets.info_book.kiwi.leveling: Pigeons can be leveled up by equipping them with a rubber ducky hat and making them kill mobs. Higher level kiwis are stronger and their §lfeathers§r §lregrow§r §lfaster§r.
